scripts.audio: docker-compose up --build && copyfiles _originals/audio/**/*.{mp3,json} assets/audio && copyfiles --soft assets/audio/** _site
scripts.production-build: set JEKYLL_ENV=production && jekyll build && copyfiles --soft assets/img/** _site && copyfiles assets/audio/** _site
scripts.code-deploy: set JEKYLL_ENV=production && jekyll build && s3_website push
scripts.gig-deploy: set JEKYLL_ENV=production && jekyll build && copyfiles --soft assets/img/** _site && copyfiles --soft assets/audio/** _site && s3_website push
